name: Ivalace
description:
Vines will randomly grow once placed,  switch between planting and trimming to add and remove vines.

right click to rotate around the house, scroll wheel to zoom, E switches to trimming and Q switches to planting

Music Attributions:

Where The Waves Take Us by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com/
